verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: blasted] [ARG1: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer , D - N.Y. ,] [ARG2: for criticizing the withdrawal from the 2015 Iran nuclear deal] -- [ARGM-ADV: noting that Schumer opposed the deal when then - President Barack Obama negotiated it] .

President Trump on Thursday blasted [ARG0: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer , D - N.Y. ,] for [V: criticizing] [ARG1: the withdrawal from the 2015 Iran nuclear deal] -- noting that Schumer opposed the deal when then - President Barack Obama negotiated it .
